column1: How should resources be loaded form jar in Java?
Which option is a good way to handle the exception?
column2: @SneakyThrow%false|e.printStackTrace()%false|Rethrow with wrapping in business exception (for example, QuestionReadException)%true|Ignoring exception%false

column1: What is the main difference between String and StringBuilder in Java?
column2: String is immutable, StringBuilder is mutable%true|String can be used for concatenation, StringBuilder cannot%false|StringBuilder can be used in multithreaded environments, String cannot%false|None of the above%false

column1: Which of these is not a valid way to create an array in Java?
column2: int[] myArray = new int[5]%false|int myArray[] = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}%false|int[][] myArray = {{1, 2}, {3, 4}}%false|All of the above are valid ways to create arrays in Java%true
